flawed_nl_solution:
On the first day, she will do 10 push-ups.
On the second day, she will do 10 + 5 = <<10+5=15>>15 push-ups.
On the third day, she will do 15 + 5 = <<15+5=20>>20 push-ups.
So, Geli will do a total of 10 + 15 + 20 = <<10+15+20=46>>46 push-ups in a week.
#### 46

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 46. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
